name: flow-validator
description: object validation with flow types and more

scripts.flow: flow check src && flow check test
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.codeclimate:coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | codeclimate-test-reporter
scripts.coverage:ci: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | codeclimate-test-reporter
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/* && babel src -d lib --source-maps && flow-copy-source -v src lib
scripts.doc:build: rm -r doc/*; mv src/index.js src/index; documentation build src -g --document-exported -f html -o doc --sort-order alpha; mv src/index src/index.js
scripts.precommit: npm run doc:lint && npm run eslint && npm run flow && npm run checkdeps && npm test && npm run coverage && npm run build && npm run build:min

author: Frederik Batuna <gobi301@gmail.com>
